metadata.title: Tuesday, 1st December, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of  Development Planning
parts: (a)    whether the Government is aware of the financial irregularities at the National Savings and Credit Bank;
(b)    if so, what the nature of the financial irregularities is; and
(c)    what urgent measures the Government is taking to secure the savings of the customers and avert a recurrence of events that led to the closure of Lima Bank.

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Environment and Natural Resources
parts: (a)    whether the hazardous copper concentrates with high arsenic content which had been imported from Chile by Konkola Copper Mines have been exported back;
(b)    if not, why, and where the copper concentrates are stored; and
(c)    if so, what proof is available to show that the concentrates were exported back.

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of  Development Planning
parts: (a)    what the total number of employees retrenched by Mopani Copper Mines Plc between 1st January, 2015 and 20th November, 2015 is;
(b)    what the outcome of the negotiations held between the mine owners and the unions, over the retrenchment exercise was; and
(c)    whether the Government is satisfied with the outcome of the negotiations.

questions.minister: Minister of Defence when the Zambia  National Service will commence the rehabilitation of feeder roads in  Milenge District.
Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a)    why the Government was not represented at the installation ceremony of Chief Mwenemundu of the Mbunda speaking people in Kalabo District which took place on 20th September, 2015;
(b)    what the relationship between the Mbunda people of Liuwa and the Government is; and
(c)    what measures the Government is taking to improve the relationship to enhance development in the area.
